text:
[Verse]
Rolling outta bed so slow
Sunlight through the window flow
Coffee brewing nice and slow
Taking time got nowhere to go

[Verse 2]
Pajamas on all day long
Humming to my favorite song
Watching clouds just float along
Lazy Sunday can't go wrong

[Chorus]
Lazy Sunday love the way
Nothing planned we just stay
In the moment every day
Lazy Sunday come and play

[Verse 3]
No deadlines no rush to meet
Barefoot walking on the street
Just us two in perfect beat
Life is sweet simple treat

[Bridge]
Resting minds and resting souls
Finding joy in simple goals
Disconnecting losing roles
Lazy Sunday makes us whole

[Verse 4]
No emails no ringing phone
This day is just ours alone
In our world a peaceful zone
Lazy Sunday sets the tone
title: Lazy Sunday
